casebody.data:
Theodore FRUCHTMAN, Appellant, HEWES & POTTER, Inc., Appellee. No. 392. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 6, 1935. Kenyon & Kenyon, of New York City, for appellant. Charles F. Perkins, of Boston, Mass., and Alexander C. Neave, of New York City, for de [eudant.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (10 F. Supp. 1011) affirmed.
